[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22background_color%22,%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”5px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ admin_label=”Column” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”2rem” header_letter_spacing=”5px” header_3_font_size=”3rem” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”15px||15px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” hover_enabled=”0″ header_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_font_size_phone=”1.5rem” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_letter_spacing_tablet=”5px” header_letter_spacing_phone=”2px” header_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The Indo Farm Team

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ admin_label=”Column” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”98ec649d-8194-4072-902f-8123460d0431″ text_font_size=”98rem” text_line_height=”2.6rem” text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|15|15|25|4|0|0″ hover_enabled=”0″ text_orientation_tablet=”justified” text_orientation_phone=”justified” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” header_4_line_height=”27px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Indo Farm Equipment Limited has a chain of serious and highly qualified professionals who always give their best. A group of youngand dynamic brains forms the backbone of our company and provides a solid foundation for future growth. Our team provides unwavering commitment towards our customers, dealers, and each other. We work with full dedication and willingness. Our team is the factor behind the skills and technology in the manufacturing of our equipment.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/MR.-RS-Khadwalia.jpg” title_text=”MR. RS Khadwalia” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]


“Indo Farm Equipment Limited is a dream come true. We started with a single objective—to manufacture a tractor that every farmer can afford and be proud of. We explored the world market and came across one of the most reputed names in the world for tractor engines. Encouraged by the overwhelming response from the tractor industry, we have now diversified into infrastructure equipment to cater to the needs of industrial, construction, and mining sectors, with fixed tower cranes being the latest inclusion in this segment. Engines being our core competence, we are now making engines for generator sets to address the growing global demand for electricity. We, at Indo Farm, are confident that with the goodwill and support of our partners and business associates, we shall continue to give our best.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

MR. RS Khadwalia
Chief Managing Director

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/MR.-ANSHUL-KHADWALIA.jpg” title_text=”MR. ANSHUL KHADWALIA” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]


“Anshul Khadwalia, our Sales & Marketing Head at IFEL’s Farming Division, is a dynamic professional with a B.Sc. (Honors) in Business Operations & Marketing from Aston University, U.K. Recognized as one of Hindustan Times’ TOP 30 UNDER 30, he brings both passion and expertise to our organization. Anshul’s influence extends beyond the boardroom; he is also an active angel investor in the Chandigarh angel network, a TED talks speaker, and a top-ranked COO in rural marketing. His unwavering dedication fuels our company’s success.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mr. Anshul Khadwalia
Joint Managing Director

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/MR.-SHUBHAM-KHADWALIA.jpg” title_text=”MR. SHUBHAM KHADWALIA” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

“Shubham Khadwalia, at the top of IFEL’s Construction Equipment Division, is a distinguished professional with a strong academic background. He holds a B.Sc. (Honours) in Operations Management and Finance from Lancaster University, U.K., along with an MSc in Strategic Marketing Management from Aston University, U.K. Shubham’s outstanding achievements have earned him the title of Young Achiever, as recognized by Dainik Bhaskar.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mr. Shubham Khadwalia
Executive Vice President – Sales & Marketing (ced)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/MRS.-DIKSHA-KHADWALIA-copy.jpg” title_text=”MRS. DIKSHA KHADWALIA copy” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

“Diksha is a highly qualified professional with an impressive educational background. She earned her B.Sc. (Honours) in International Business and Finance and Economics from Manchester Business School and furthered her education with an MBA from IESE Business School in Barcelona.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mrs. Diksha Khadwalia
Executive Vice President – International Business

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
